TopicTitle: Vab Suggestion: option to select wich part to attach to

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I offer a humble suggestion for the VAB: give the option to select a part of a vessel to which ATTACH things to.§

When messing around with strange Kerbal Crafts I end up with lots of parts one near the other and trying to "persuade" one to attach to THAT one and not the one near it is a pain.

Thank you for your time.
